topic: The evolution, unique properties, and applications of bimetallic catalysts in heterogeneous catalysis: Bridging the gap between model surfaces and industrially relevant supported catalysts
QuestionEnglish: How have bimetallic catalysts evolved in heterogeneous catalysis since their commercial introduction, and how do their unique electronic and chemical properties contribute to bridging the "materials gap" and "pressure gap" between model surfaces and industrially relevant supported catalysts in both fundamental research and practical applications?
QuestionChinese: 自商业引入以来，双金属催化剂在多相催化领域是如何发展的，它们独特的电子和化学性质如何有助于弥合基础研究和实际应用中模型表面与工业相关负载催化剂之间的"材料差距"和"压力差距"？
